example.text: #HR2 is an extreme & cruel bill that would: ?Provide NO new funds for CBP officers at FL ports of entry ?Increase inflation, hurt agriculture/construction, and destroy our economy ?Force unaccompanied children into dangerous situations & deny asylum This is NOT the solution. [[url]]

We joined a gun violence prevention meeting hosted by [[user]] in Orlando. We passed the Bipartisan #SaferCommunities Act last Congress and continue working with school districts, local law enforcement, policymakers, and advocates to draw down critical gun safety grants. [[url]]

Met with [[user]] to discuss federal funding opportunities for their cutting-edge research. Proud to support their efforts to educate the next generation of Central Florida’s nurses and alleviate shortages with a brand-new nursing school in Lake Nona. #GoKnights! [[url]]

Standing with Biden to Lower Gas Prices I spoke against HR 21, the Strategic Production Response Act on the House floor. President Biden has successfully used the Strategic Petroleum Reserve to respond to the supply disruptions caused by the war in Ukraine.
